name: malefaction
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour or an act that is criminal or bad: He came forward with incriminating information related to their malefactions. My only malefaction was choosing the wrong man to marry. These novelists have created characters who are capable of stylish malefaction.
More examplesFewer examplesA guilty party should not be protected from the consequences of its own malefaction.I would like to argue that this sort of crime is not the malefaction that does the most harm.Her life had been full of malefactions.
